verses.name: Genesis 26:17
verses.text: And Isaac departed thence, and pitched his tent in the valley of Gerar, and dwelt there.

verses.name: Genesis 26:18
verses.text: And Isaac digged again the wells of water, which they had digged in the days of Abraham his father; for the Philistines had stopped them after the death of Abraham: and he called their names after the names by which his father had called them.

verses.name: Genesis 26:19
verses.text: And Isaac’s servants digged in the valley, and found there a well of springing water.
